thag4.12:1.1: I went forth to save my life.
thag4.12:2.1: gladly, let this body be broken!
thag4.12:2.2: Let this scrap of meat disintegrate!
thag4.12:2.3: Let both my legs fall off
thag4.12:3.1: I won’t eat, I won’t drink,
thag4.12:3.3: nor will I lie down on my side,
thag4.12:3.4: until the dart of craving is plucked.
